snippet: BEN-DAYAN--Amalia. With heads bowed, Israel Cancer Research Fund mourns the passing of Amalia Ben-Dayan, a woman of valor to all who knew her. We extend deepest condolences to her sons and daughters: ICRF Vice President Charles Ben-Dayan, Avi Ben-Dayan, Eli Ben-Dayan, Genya Jacobowitz, Aliza Hoffman, Adina Gerber and to the entire family. Bradley Goldhar, President; Kenneth Goodman, Chairman; Eric Heffler, National Executive Director; Kenneth Gabel, New York Director of Development 1/3
lead_paragraph: BEN-DAYAN--Amalia. With heads bowed, Israel Cancer Research Fund mourns the passing of Amalia Ben-Dayan, a woman of valor to all who knew her. We extend deepest condolences to her sons and daughters: ICRF Vice President Charles Ben-Dayan, Avi Ben-Dayan, Eli Ben-Dayan, Genya Jacobowitz, Aliza Hoffman, Adina Gerber and to the entire family. Bradley Goldhar, President; Kenneth Goodman, Chairman; Eric Heffler, National Executive Director; Kenneth Gabel, New York Director of Development 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  BEN, DAYAN, AMALIA
